iPhone XR and iPhone XS

Apple iPhone XS

iPhone XS display has beautiful curved design.

Apple iPhone XR

It is a iPhone 7's smaller overall size

Apple iPhone X

Our best and beautifull design ever.

Apple iPhone XS

*Display. Screen size (inches) 5.80. Touchscreen.
*Hardware. Processor. hexa-core. Processor make.
*Camera. Rear camera. 12-megapixel (f/1.8, 1.4-micron) + 12-megapixel (f/2.4) Rear autofocus.
*Software. Operating system. iOS 12.

Apple iPhone XR

*The new display on iPhone XR is the most advanced LCD in the industry.
*An innovative backlight design allows the screen to stretch into the corners..
*So you see true-to-life color from one beautiful edge to the other.

Apple iPhone X

*The iPhone X features a bezel-less 5.8-inch OLED display with a top notch for the camera
*Unlike other iPhones, the iPhone X only comes in one color: black.
*However it looks like Apple may have planned to release a gold version as well.
